import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Form, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; const AddMovie = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const[title,setTitle]=useState("") const[description,setDescription]=useState("") const[rate,setRate]=use return (
Modal heading Title: Description: Rate: PosterUrl:
) } export default AddMovie
